article_title: State targets some returns for verification
article_text:
JANESVILLE--Taxpayers expecting Wisconsin refunds might want to watch their mail for something other than checks. For the second ...

article_metadata.Description: For the second year, the state Department of Revenue is running a program designed to protect taxpayers' identities and refunds from fraudsters.
